  1. Please provide your personal ETH-address from an wallet that supports ERC20-Tokens (For example MyEtherWallet).
    We will send the tokens to you to this address. If you have no ETH-address, visit our Help Center or Contact our Support.
  2. Once you saved your address, we will allow you to change it until the END of ICO (A confirmation via e-mail will be required).
  3. We will release your NGC tokens within 7 days after the ICO.
  4. We will send you an e-mail after the distribution of tokens was successful
  5. After the succesfull distribution you will see your NGC tokens in your wallet.

If you decide to change your recipient address, we will send you a confirmation e-mail.
A change can be requested only once per hour.
